newsitem.title: USA: Principal, Tamaris in finance deal.
newsitem.headline: Principal, Tamaris in finance deal.

text.p: Principal Healthcare Finance Ltd said it had completed financing transactions with Britain's Tamaris Plc, involving nine nursing home properties in the Midlands and in Scotland.

The company said in a statement late on Tuesday the deals followed investment in four properties operated by Tamaris in Northern England which were financed in June, and brought total fundings with Tamaris to $16.6 million.

Principal was organized in 1995 to provide sale/leaseback and other financing to the health care industry in the United Kingdom. It was established by and is partly owned by Omega Healthcare Investors Inc.
